examples.example: 这家超市的商品价格合理，吸引了很多顾客。

translate.english: The goods in this supermarket have reasonable prices and attract a lot of customers.

examples.example: 这件衣服的价格很实惠，而且质量也非常不错。

translate.english: The price of this dress is very reasonable and the quality is also very good.

examples.example: 我们应该关注商品的质量和价格，选择性价比高的进行购买。

translate.english: We should pay attention to the quality and price of the goods and choose those with high cost performance to purchase.
